page_title: GOLD JOB AGENCY - Your Career in Europe

hero.subtitle: We are a leading employment agency specializing in connecting talented employees from Asia, Africa, and America with top companies in the European Union. Our company was created for people seeking new professional opportunities tailored to their qualifications and aspirations.

features.feature1_desc: Every candidate is unique to us. We analyze your skills and expectations to find the perfect position.
features.feature2_desc: We have been operating for years, enjoying the trust of hundreds of employees and employers. We focus on transparency and professionalism.
features.feature3_desc: We provide full support at every stage – from recruitment, through formalities, to accommodation and on-site support.

quality.title: Quality and Safety Guarantee
quality.desc: Our many years of experience, during which we have often faced crisis situations, have allowed us to develop a system where the employee is guaranteed employment with a proven employer, and on the other hand, the employer is guaranteed to hire a qualified employee.
quality.button: We are a legally operating Employment Agency registered in KRAZ under number 34778

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle1: We specialize in connecting employers with qualified employees from all over the world. Our services cover a full range of support - from recruitment to adaptation in a new workplace.
services.subtitle2: Our experts have been active in the job market since 2017. Since then, we have successfully connected employees and employers in countries such as Poland, Lithuania, Germany, and Sweden. We have been trusted by hundreds of employees from Asia, South America, and Eastern Europe.
services.service1_desc: Comprehensive recruitment of qualified employees from EU and non-EU countries. We check qualifications, experience, and language skills.
services.service2_title: Handling of HR and Legal Formalities
services.service2_desc: We handle the preparation and management of all employment-related documents – from contracts, through ZUS registrations, to employee records and payroll.
services.service3_desc: Professional industry training, language courses, and adaptation programs to prepare for work in Europe.

employees.title: For Employees
employees.desc: Find your dream job in Europe with Gold Job Agency. We offer positions in various sectors and provide full support at every stage of recruitment.
employees.category1_desc: Construction and infrastructure projects throughout Europe.
employees.cat6_desc: Cleaning staff in hotels and offices

employers.title: For Employers
employers.desc: We provide comprehensive HR solutions to help your business grow. We offer flexible forms of cooperation and access to qualified employees.
carousel_texts: CHANGES IN REGULATIONS ON THE EMPLOYMENT OF FOREIGNERS
PENALTIES FOR ILLEGAL EMPLOYMENT OF A FOREIGNER
CONDUCT AN AUDIT TO AVOID PENALTIES
employers.solution1_desc: Flexible acquisition of employees without the need for direct employment.
employers.solution2_desc: We handle the preparation and management of all documents related to employment – from contracts, through social security registrations, to maintaining employee documentation and payroll. We guarantee legality and employment security, also for employees from abroad.
employers.solution3_desc: We offer professional advice on employee selection, analysis of staffing needs, and optimization of employment processes. We help build effective teams and support the development of your company's employer branding.
employers.solution4_title: Fast and flexible hiring of temporary workers
employers.solution4_desc: We provide the ability to quickly source employees for replacements, seasonal projects, or emergencies. Thanks to a wide base of candidates and efficient recruitment processes, we respond instantly to your current staffing needs.
employers.solution5_title: Promotion of job offers and employer branding
employers.solution5_desc: We ensure effective promotion of your job offers on job portals, in social media, and in industry-specific communication channels. We support building a positive image of your company as an attractive employer in the job market.
